name: Notion Task Manager
description: Version 2 launched! Overall better interface and UX NEW: Time Blocking view NEW: Anti-procrastination buttons NEW: Custom Workspace page with Distractions section and Quick Links NEW: See Recent Edits section in all pages REWORK: Core Tasks → Strict Tasks REWORK: Renamed Purpose → Areas (to match PARA method) REWORK: All task difficulties can now have sub-items And so much more! Beat procrastination today.Procrastinating too often? No motivation to complete your tasks on time?Use this Notion Ant
features: Overall better interface and UX; NEW: Time Blocking view; NEW: Anti-procrastination buttons; NEW: Custom Workspace page with Distractions section and Quick Links; NEW: See Recent Edits section in all pages; REWORK: Core Tasks → Strict Tasks; REWORK: Renamed Purpose → Areas (to match PARA method); REWORK: All task difficulties can now have sub-items; And so much more!; A task manager with several anti-procrastination features to help prevent you from delaying your tasks
